title: 16-Year-Old Climbs Train Engine To Take Selfie, Gets Electrocuted, Dies - NDTV
content:
1. 16-Year-Old Climbs Train Engine To Take Selfie, Gets Electrocuted, Dies  NDTV
  2. Tamil Nadu: Trains mows down 3 youths making Instagram reel  The Indian Express
  3. View Full coverage on Google News
description: A 16-year-old boy died after he was electrocuted when he came in contact with a high-tension electricity cable while attempting a selfie on top of a stationary train engine. The incident happened at Madhya Pradesh's Chhatarpur railway station.
